verbose_text: Application of the JAK2 / STAT3 signaling pathway blocker AG490 partially blocked the activation of the JAK2 / STAT3 signaling pathway and reduced the Bax / Bcl-2 ratio and finally caused a significant decrease in the cell apoptosis rate.
evidence: STAT3 signaling pathway blocker AG490 partially blocked the activation of the JAK2/STAT3 signaling pathway and reduced the Bax/Bcl-2
